channel.title: Adding Curses

item.title: Adding Curses
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

I’m adding curses by asshole_rule’s tutorial, and I keep getting an error that even he cant fix.

My added code:

public Curse getCurse() { return Curse; }

src\server\model\players\Client.java:746: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Curse location: class server.model.players.Client return Curse; ^

Read full topic
